data.event: The municipality is now included in the Lower Sava Statistical Region.

event.title: was attested in written records in 1309

data.event: Blanca was attested in written records in 1309 as Blanitz.

event.title: were found in the area in 1892

data.event: Prehistoric burial mounds were found in the area in 1892, testifying to early settlement.
A civic center was built in 1949, and a fire station in 1954.
